com.vmware.content.library.item

Interface File

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, FileTypes, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileStub

    public interface File
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, FileTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The File interface can be used to query for information on the files within a library item. Files are objects which are added to a library item through the UpdateSession and File interfaces.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  File.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the File#get vAPI operation.
      static interface  File.ListInvocation
      Invocable that represents the File#list vAPI operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.content.library.item.FileTypes

        FileTypes.ChecksumAlgorithm, FileTypes.ChecksumInfo, FileTypes.Info

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.content.library.item.FileTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String libraryItemId, java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves the information for a single file in a library item by its name.
      File.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String libraryItemId)
      Lists all of the files that are stored within a given library item.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        File.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String libraryItemId,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves the information for a single file in a library item by its name.

        Invocation Result:
        The FileTypes.Info object with information on the specified file.

        Parameters:
        libraryItemId - Identifier of the library item whose file information should be returned. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.content.library.Item.
        name - Name of the file in the library item whose information should be returned.
        Returns:
        instance of File.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        NotFound - if libraryItemId refers to a library item that does not exist.
        NotFound - if name refers to a file that does not exist in the library item.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • The resource com.vmware.content.library.Item referenced by the parameter libraryItemId requires System.Read.

      • list

        File.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String libraryItemId)
        Lists all of the files that are stored within a given library item.

        Invocation Result:
        The List of all of the files that are stored within the given library item.

        Parameters:
        libraryItemId - Identifier of the library item whose files should be listed. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.content.library.Item.
        Returns:
        instance of File.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        NotFound - if libraryItemId refers to a library item that does not exist.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • The resource com.vmware.content.library.Item referenced by the parameter libraryItemId requires System.Read.
